MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.58pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Diamond substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:37pm on Sunday, 08 November 2020
